scripts.cf:preview: npm run cf:build && npx wrangler dev
scripts.cf:dev: npm run cf:build && npx opennextjs-cloudflare preview
scripts.cf:deploy: npm run cf:build && npx opennextjs-cloudflare deploy
scripts.cf:deploy:staging: npm run cf:build && npx wrangler versions deploy --branch staging
scripts.cf:deploy:branch: npm run cf:build && npx wrangler versions deploy
